thread.title: HotDocs to Showcase the Latest Versions of its Leading Document Automation Technology at the 2015 Association of Corporate Counsel Annual Meeting
thread.title_full: HotDocs to Showcase the Latest Versions of its Leading Document Automation Technology at the 2015 Association of Corporate Counsel Annual Meeting - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: HotDocs to Showcase the Latest Versions of its Leading Document Automation Technology at the 2015 Association of Corporate Counsel Annual Meeting
text:
HotDocs, the global leader in document automation technology, is participating in the 2015 ACC Annual Meeting being held October 18-21 in Boston. HotDocs is exhibiting in booth 203 where it will be demonstrating the latest versions of its award winning document automation technology.
Lindon, Utah (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
HotDocs , the global leader in document automation technology, is participating in the 2015 ACC Annual Meeting being held October 18-21 in Boston. HotDocs is exhibiting in booth 203 where it will be demonstrating the latest versions of its award winning document automation technology.
In addition to exhibiting its popular document automation products, HotDocs will showcase several new developments including its partnership with K2. This partnership brings the power of HotDocsâ€™ enterprise document assembly alongside K2 forms and workflow automation enabling customers to easily create even the most complex documents with HotDocs Cloud solutions from anywhere and submit them to an approval workflow. ACC attendees can also get a look at HotDocs Academy, our new online training resource center. This new resource will provide HotDocs users with an entire library of videos on all topics ranging from a simple introduction to advanced document automation template authoring.
Attendees that visit the HotDocs booth will qualify for exclusive discounts on HotDocs Developer, Developer LE and HotDocs User licenses as well as other ACC promotions.
For more information about HotDocs, visit http://www.hotdocs.com or connect with HotDocs on its blog, and on Twitter, LinkedIn or Facebook.
ABOUT HOTDOCS
HotDocs is the global leader of automated document automation technology, with customers in over 50 different countries and a user-base, globally, that is one million strong. Widely used within the legal, banking, and insurance industries and in both the public and corporate sectors, HotDocs ensures accuracy and compliance, mitigates risk and increases operational efficiency in the creation of simple or complex repeat documentation such as contracts, loan packages and other legal documentation. HotDocs is available on premise, on desktop, or via the cloud and can operate in a standalone capacity or as part of a wider business process management system, such as workflow, document management or case management systems.
